title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 196.13 - Facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 196.13 - Facilities

State Regulations

Each course shall be conducted in such premises and in such
facilities as shall be necessary to properly present the course. The sponsor
must provide a certificate of occupancy, and fire and health permits for the
specific facility to be used and must attest that the facility is in full
compliance with the Federal Americans with Disabilities Act. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
196.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
